verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of the sons of Korah, set to Alamoth. A Song.) God <S%H430><s%> is our refuge <S%H4268><s%> and strength, <S%H5797><s%> A very <S%H3966><s%> present <S%H4672><s%> help <S%H5833><s%> in trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> we will not fear, <S%H3372><s%> though the earth <S%H776><s%> should change, <S%H4171><s%> And though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> slip <S%H4131><s%> into the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%>

Though its waters <S%H4325><s%> roar <S%H1993><s%> [and] foam, <S%H2560><s%> Though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> quake <S%H7493><s%> at its swelling <S%H1346><s%> pride. <S%H1346><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

There is a river <S%H5104><s%> whose streams <S%H6388><s%> make <S%H8055><s%> glad <S%H8055><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> The holy <S%H6918><s%> dwelling <S%H4908><s%> places <S%H4908><s%> of the Most <S%H9411><s%> High. <S%H9411><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her, she will not be moved; <S%H4131><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> her when morning <S%H1242><s%> dawns. <S%H6437><s%>

The nations <S%H1471><s%> made <S%H1993><s%> an uproar, <S%H1993><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> tottered; <S%H4131><s%> He raised <S%H5414><s%> His voice, <S%H6963><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> melted. <S%H4127><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with us; The God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our stronghold. <S%H4869><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Come, <S%H1980><s%> behold <S%H2372><s%> the works <S%H9282><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> has wrought <S%H7760><s%> desolations <S%H8047><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He makes wars <S%H4421><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> He breaks <S%H7665><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%> and cuts <S%H7112><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> in two; <S%H7112><s%> He burns <S%H8313><s%> the chariots <S%H5699><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

"Cease <S%H7503><s%> [striving] and know <S%H3045><s%> that I am God; <S%H430><s%> I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with us; The God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our stronghold. <S%H4869><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
